alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 2:07AM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches are possible, especially above 7,500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph creating areas of reduced visibilities in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. These hazardous conditions will impact the holiday travel period.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Upper Rio Grande Valley
